instructions.sl.utf8: Pazljivo preberite vsako izjavo. Če se z izjavo strinjate, obkljukajte ustrezno polje.
instructions.en.utf8: Read each statement carefully. If you agree with the statement, than tick the appropriate checkbox.

question.sl.utf8: Razumem pomen pri počasni in razločni izgovorjavi z daljšimi premori.
question.en.utf8: I can understand when someone speaks very slowly to me and articulates carefully, with long pauses for me to assimilate meaning.

question.sl.utf8: Razumem preprosta navodila o tem, kako priti peš ali z javnim prevozom z enega kraja na drugega.
question.en.utf8: I can understand simple directions on how to get from X to Y, on foot or by public transport.

question.sl.utf8: Razumem vprašanja in nasvete, ki so podani počasi in razločno ter sem sposoben slediti preprostim navodilom.
question.en.utf8: I can understand questions and instructions addressed carefully and slowly to me and follow short, simple directions.

question.sl.utf8: Razumem izraze za števila, cene, čas.
question.en.utf8: I can understand numbers, prices and times.

question.sl.utf8: V preprostih vsakodnevnih pogovorih razumem jasno, počasno govorjenje, naslovljeno name.
question.en.utf8: I can understand what is said clearly, slowly and directly to me in simple everyday conversation/speech.

question.sl.utf8: Prepoznavam besedne zveze, besede in izraze, ki se nanašajo na najnujnejše reči (npr. najosnovnejši osebni in družinski podatki, nakupi, bližnja okolica, zaposlitev).
question.en.utf8: I can recognise phrases, words and expressions related to areas of most immediate priority (e.g. very basic personal and family information, shopping, local geography, employment).

question.sl.utf8: Prepoznam temo pogovora, če ljudje govorijo počasi in razločno.
question.en.utf8: I can generally identify the topic of discussion when people speak slowly and clearly.

question.sl.utf8: Razumem bistvo kratkih jasnih in preprostih sporočil in napovedi.
question.en.utf8: I can understand the main point in short and simple messages and announcements.

question.sl.utf8: Razumem bistvo televizijskih poročil, ko je komentar podprt s sliko.
question.en.utf8: I can understand the essential information of the television news if commentary is supported by an image.

question.sl.utf8: Iz radijskih in televizijskih programov ter filmov in videov znam izluščiti bistveno sporočilo.
question.en.utf8: I can identify the main point of television and radio news as well as movies and videos.

question.sl.utf8: V krajših posnetih besedilih, ki se nanašajo na znane teme, razumem tudi določene podrobnosti, če lahko besedilo poslušam več kot enkrat.
question.en.utf8: In short recorded massages dealing with known themes I can also understand some details if I can listen to the text more than once.

question.sl.utf8: V vsakdanjih pogovorih lahko sledim razločnemu govoru, vendar moram včasih govorca prositi, naj ponovi določene besede in besedne zveze.
question.en.utf8: I can follow clearly articulated speech directed at me in everyday conversation, though I sometimes have to ask for the repetition of particular words and phrases.

question.sl.utf8: Na splošno lahko sledim daljšemu razgovoru, vendar le, če je govor razločen in v standardnem jeziku.
question.en.utf8: I can generally follow the main points of extended discussion around me, provided speech is clearly articulated in standard dialect.

question.sl.utf8: Sposoben sem poslušati krajšo pripoved in predvideti nadaljnje dogajanje.
question.en.utf8: I can listen to a short narrative and speculate about what will happen next.

question.sl.utf8: Razumem vsebino in bistvo radijskih poročil in tonskih posnetkov, če so prebrana počasi in razločno.
question.en.utf8: I can understand the main points of radio news bulletins and simpler recorded material on topics of personal interest when delivered relatively slowly and clearly.

question.sl.utf8: Lahko povzamem vsebino in bistvo televizijskih oddaj, če so prebrani počasi in razločno.
question.en.utf8: I can understand the main points of television programmes on familiar topics when the delivery is relatively slow and clear.

question.sl.utf8: Razumem preproste tehnične informacije, kot so navodila za uporabo vsakdanjih tehničnih naprav.
question.en.utf8: I can understand simple technical information, such as operating instructions for everyday equipment.

question.sl.utf8: Tudi v hrupnem okolju podrobno razumem, kaj mi kdo pove v standardnem jeziku.
question.en.utf8: I can understand in detail what is said to me in standard spoken language, even in a noisy environment.

question.sl.utf8: Lahko sledim predavanjem ali referatom, ki se nanašajo na moje izobraževalno področje, če poznam tematiko in če je povedano na preprost in jasen način.
question.en.utf8: I can follow a lecture or talk within my own field, provided the subject matter is familiar and the presentation straightforward and clearly structured.

question.sl.utf8: Pri poslušanju radia lahko razumem večino dokumentarnih oddaj v standardnem jeziku in ocenim razpoloženje govorca.
question.en.utf8: I can understand most radio documentaries delivered in standard language and can identify the speaker's mood, tone, etc.

question.sl.utf8: Pri gledanju televizije razumem dokumentarne in razvedrilne oddaje, intervjuje in večino filmov, če niso v narečju, pač pa v standardnem jeziku.
question.en.utf8: I can understand TV documentaries, live interviews, talk shows, plays and the majority of films in standard dialect.

question.sl.utf8: Razumem bistvo sporočil o konkretnih in abstraktnih temah v standardnem jeziku, razumem pa tudi strokovne razprave s svojega izobraževalnega področja.
question.en.utf8: I can understand the main ideas of complex speech on both concrete and abstract topics delivered in a standard dialect, including technical discussions in my field of specialisation.

question.sl.utf8: Za razumevanje uporabljam različne prijeme (npr. prisluhnem glavnim točkam ali uporabim napotke iz tematike), da preverjam svoje razumevanje.
question.en.utf8: I can use a variety of strategies to achieve comprehension, for example, listening for main points or checking comprehension by using contextual clues.

question.sl.utf8: Znam slediti daljšim govornim prispevkom in pogovorom, čeprav njihova zgradba in situacija, v kateri pogovor poteka, nista jasni/izraziti.
question.en.utf8: I can follow extended speech even when it is not clearly structured and when relationships are only implied and not signalled explicitly.

question.sl.utf8: Razumem precej idiomatskih in pogovornih izrazov ter slogovno in funkcijsko različnost.
question.en.utf8: I can understand a wide range of idiomatic expressions and colloquialisms, appreciating shifts in style and register.

question.sl.utf8: Tudi iz javnih obvestil slabše kakovosti (npr. na postajah javnih prevoznih sredstev, športnih prizoriščih itn.) znam izluščiti podatke, ki jih potrebujem.
question.en.utf8: I can extract specific information even from poor quality, audibly distorted public announcements, e.g. in a station, sports stadium, etc.

question.sl.utf8: Razumem zapletene tehnične podatke, kot so navodila za uporabo/upravljanje, specifikacije za izdelke in storitve, ki jih poznam.
question.en.utf8: I can understand complex technical information, such as operating instructions or specifications for familiar products and services.

question.sl.utf8: Razumem predavanja, govore in poročila s svojega interesnega področja, čeprav so vsebinsko ali jezikovno zahtevni.
question.en.utf8: I can understand lectures, talks and reports in my field of interest even when the content and language are complex.

question.sl.utf8: Brez posebnega napora razumem filme, v katerih so uporabljeni sleng in idiomatski izrazi.
question.en.utf8: I can without too much effort understand films employing a considerable degree of slang and idiomatic usage.

question.sl.utf8: Nimam nobenih težav pri razumevanju govorjenega jezika, ne glede na to, ali sledim pogovorom v živo ali v medijih, tudi če govorijo hitro. Potrebujem samo nekaj časa, da se navadim na poseben naglas.
question.en.utf8: I have no difficulty in understanding any kind of spoken language, whether live or broadcast, even when delivered at fast, native-speaker-like speed, provided I have some time to become familiar with the accent.
